decision_tree.nodes: [{"id": "n1", "type": "clinical_criterion", "question": "Does the patient have a diagnosis of myocardial infarction?", "data_type": "boolean", "help_text": "Myocardial infarction, commonly known as a heart attack, occurs when blood flow to a part of the heart muscle is blocked.", "validation": [{"key": "required", "value": "true"}], "connections": [{"target_node_id": "n2", "condition": "equal", "condition_value": "true"}, {"target_node_id": "n3", "condition": "equal", "condition_value": "false"}]}, {"id": "n2", "type": "question", "question": "What is the patient's current age?", "data_type": "numeric", "help_text": "Please enter the patient's age in years.", "validation": [{"key": "min", "value": "0"}, {"key": "max", "value": "120"}], "connections": [{"target_node_id": "n3", "condition": "default"}]}, {"id": "n3", "type": "question", "question": "Are there any contraindications to administering the medication?", "data_type": "boolean", "help_text": "Contraindications are specific situations in which a drug, procedure, or surgery should not be used because the risk of using it outweighs any potential benefit.
